author: Dorian Kachur
text:
Does anyone have examples of organizational customer service standards or charters, that define what 'great customer service' looks like in your organization?  This is for the purpose of establishing consistent expectations of how staff treat, respond to, assist customers generally.
Thanks.
title: Customer Service Standards
